title: Beautifully Redone Family Home for Rent
description: This gorgeous three story 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom Francisville townhome includes parking for up to 2 cars, 1650 sqft of living space and 1200 sqft of lawn plus 3 outdoor spaces! Enter the open concept living room/dining room with hardwood floors, crown molding and baseboard trim and walk back to the spacious kitchen. With gorgeous cherry cabinetry, granite counters and breakfast bar, modern black refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, gas range/oven and garbage disposal. Walk out to enjoy your large, private back yard that goes all the way through to Opal Street, where there is 1 car parking, plus room to pull another car in through the back gate if desired. Cooking out is easy with the provided grill and picnic table. On the second floor is the first bedroom and full bathroom. With a custom-built queen size murphy bed, large closets and plenty of storage. Off the hall is also the first deck, perfect for lounging, as well as a full bathroom with tub/shower combination. On the third floor is the master bedroom with huge walk-in closet, crown molding, and en-suite full bathroom with large tiled shower and double vanity. A second deck off the back of this floor includes spiral stairs to the full roof top deck. With the privacy afforded by no adjoining decks and an amazing Center City skyline view, this is the perfect place to watch the fireworks on the provided 7-piece furniture set. Walking downstairs there is a fully finished basement with new Berber carpets and recessed lighting, plus a mounted flat screen tv with sound bar, and laundry room with full size washer and dryer. With one-zone C/A and multiple thermostats, central heat, ceiling fans in the bedrooms, and an included alarm monitoring service, this home has it all!

title: Studio Apartment Home with City View on Rittenhouse Square, Roof Deck
description:
The studio apartment home at 507 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 5th floor features large windows that face north and have a city skyline view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as October 17, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Sue's Produce Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Paper Source, gorjana, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Scotch & Soda, Bluemercury, Brooklinen, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, Tselaine, Ritual Shoppe, MAC Cosmetics, Sephora, Nordstrom Rack. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Pizzeria Vetri, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, and The Continental Mid-town. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at nearby Van Leeuwen or Jeni's. Sample the Rittenhouse Churro sundae from El Merkury. Pick up warm cookies from Insomnia Cookies. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Stroll across the park and then grab a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Pick up a selection of scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar, Nail Spa Bar, or Coco Blue Spruce. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theatres. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!

* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.

description:
The 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home at 2015 is available for lease at this moment! This home on the 20th floor features large windows that mainly face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One window in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a park view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as September 20, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Giant Heirloom Market, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Sprouts, Whole Foods, and Reading Terminal Market. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, Paper Source, The Dr. Martens Store, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Theory, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar, Nail Spa Bar, or Coco Blue Spruce. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Pizzeria Vetri, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, or The Continental Mid-town. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Vibrant, Alchemy, Di Bruno Bros., or Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen or Jeni's. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury! Stroll across the park and then grab a loaf of French Table at Metropolitan Bakery. Pick up a turkey club at Marathon on the Square. Buy a babka, brookie, sticky bun, scone, or muffin from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!

title: Restored Trinity Near University City, Nice Yard
description:
Welcome to this beautiful cozy townhome with old world charm and character at the end of a cul-de-sac. Great two-bedroom property with complete privacy right in the middle of the city.
This house has original heart of pine wooden floors and features a spiral staircase. Exposed brick accent wall in the living room with plenty of natural light. Brand new bathroom and renovated kitchen in 2021. Built in washer and dryer unit on the first floor and plenty of storage in the basement.
Spacious brick back patio with a large Magnolia tree that gives this back yard shade and privacy in the summer.
This house is pet friendly.
The house is only two blocks from the market street El, which gives easy access to Center City and elsewhere. Easy walking distance to University of Pennsylvania, Drexel University, Clark Park, playgrounds, shopping and grocery stores. Additionally, there are multiple dining and entertainment options within walking distance. Major highways and access to center city and the airport is just minutes away.
Background checks are done with National Tenant Network for all candidates. There is a security deposit and background check fee.
Lease ends August 30, 2023

title: Cat Friendly Apartment with New Kitchen, Tons of Natural Light
description:
Do you find yourself watching the world go by. Well here is a chance to get a birds eye view of the world in the heart of University City. Huge One bedroom apartment with an extra room that can be curtained off or used as a den. The apartment has tons of gorgeous natural light. There are six closets in the apartment so it has a lot of storage. Hardwood floors through out. Balcony overlooking the corner of 48th and Cedar.
New kitchen with granite countertops, subway tile, and appliances. Garage disposal too.
The apartment is a mother-in-law suite, which means you go through the owners house to get to the apartment. Because of that, we are being really careful who we rent to. We would prefer a couple or single person, who loves their own space, but will respect our space as they go through. No parties are allowed. The rent is lower than normal for this size apartment.
Cats are ok, but no dogs. We have a dog though so you must like dogs.
There is a Washer and Dryer in the building. Tenants pay electrical and gas. Gas bill is only for the stove.
This apartment is a block from Baltimore Avenue, 4 blocks from Clark Park, a block from Mariposa Grocery store, Local Pez, Gold Standard, and near many restaurants and bars. Its a great family friendly neighborhood with large trees.
Call Mike to set up an appointment. No calls before 9 am or after 9 pm

title: Spacious 2br Luxirious Home for Rent
description:
Welcome to 2119 N Front St #302! Located in The Aegis, a beautiful building with intercom controlled access and luxurious finishes throughout. Unit #302 is a bi-level 2 bedroom / 1.5 bathroom apartment at the back of the building featuring a private roof deck! Enter into the unit with stairs to your right and main living space to the left. Recessed lighting and hardwood floors stretch the length of the apartment and a half bathroom is off the kitchen for added convenience. The L-shaped kitchen boasts white shaker cabinets, gorgeous tile backsplash, counter seating, and a full lineup of stainless steel appliances. You'll find your stacked washer & dryer in a closet and the space opens into your sizable living area with great natural light. Continue upstairs to view your 2 bedrooms, both spacious and bright with ample closet space. Your full bathroom is also on this level equipped with a lighted vanity, paisley floor tiling, and a fully tiled shower / tub combo. A private roof deck with room for furniture is perfect for the warmer months!
About The Neighborhood: Located in the desirable East Kensington neighborhood and walkable to tons of great shopping, restaurants, and nightlife options. You'll be just steps from the Market Frankford Line for an easy commute throughout the city. Walkable to Norris Square, Konrad Square, & Tower Playground. You'll be close to Fishtown for countless entertainment options and not far from Riverwards Produce for convenient shopping. Neighborhood favorite hotspots include Franny Lou's Porch, Pizza Brain, Urban Axes, Halftime Goodtimes, Forin Cafe, Martha, Atlantis, and more! Lease Terms: Generally, first month, last month, and one month security deposit due at, or prior to, lease signing.

title: Renovated 1 BR Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Near Coffee Shops
description:
The 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home at 414 is available for lease at this moment! This home on the 4th floor features large windows that mainly face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view of Chancellor Street including the loading dock. One window in the bedroom area faces south and has a view of Chancellor Street. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at Sue's Produce Market, the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Giant Heirloom Market, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Sprouts, Whole Foods, and Reading Terminal Market. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Tselaine, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, Paper Source, The Dr. Martens Store, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Theory, Sephora, and Nordstrom Rack. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar, Nail Spa Bar, or Coco Blue Spruce. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Pizzeria Vetri, Luke's Lobster Rittenhouse, Tria Cafe Rittenhouse, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, The Dandelion, and The Continental Mid-town. Savor a coffee at La Colombe, Ultimo, Vibrant, Alchemy, Di Bruno Bros, or Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at nearby Van Leeuwen or Jeni's. Stroll across the park and then grab a loaf of French Table at Metropolitan Bakery. Pick up a turkey club at Marathon on the Square. Buy a babka, a sticky bun, or a scone from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Philadelphia Museum of Art. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Package lockers
* Bike storage
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and 24/7 concierge desk staff
* 24/7 on-site maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on 4th floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Renovated bathroom
* Wood floors
* Large mainly east-facing windows with Chancellor Street view
* One south-facing window with Chancellor Street view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 414 is still listed under the Warhol floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. We welcome you to tour your new home in person. Live virtual tours in Zoom are also available!
Please note that the leasing office closed at 12:00 PM on Friday, September 2, 2022 and will reopen at 9:00 AM on Tuesday, September 6, 2022.

title: Furnished row home in Graduate Hospital
description:
We are two academics at Penn planning to take our sabbatical in Spring and Summer 2023. Our modern, bright, and spacious (2223 sq ft) house has 3 bedrooms and 2/1 bathrooms. The first floor has soaring ceilings with recessed lighting, hardwood floors, exposed brick, a living room fireplace, a powder room, and an open-concept kitchen. The kitchen opens into a private brick-paved patio with rose bushes and ivy (the ideal place to work on a nice day).
On the second floor we have a lofted space where we have built a home office with monitors and accessories for two people. There is also a guest bedroom with a queen bed, a private balcony, and a full bathroom. The third floor has spacious master bedroom with a king bed, a full bathroom with both a bathtub and a frameless glass shower surround, and a third bedroom (currently being used as a nursery) with another private balcony. There are two skylights that let in lots of natural light. Our basement is finished and has a large-screen TV and a sofa-bed. We have a 4 year old daughter so there are plenty of toys and lots of children's furniture (we can put this in storage if you don’t need it).
We absolutely love our neighborhood, and you will too! It is filled with academics, doctors, and other professionals, and is very child friendly.  There are several grocery stores, restaurants, shops, schools, parks, and playgrounds nearby. We are also a short walk to Penn, Drexel, and CHOP, and to Rittenhouse square (where you will find Philly's best restaurants and shops). We are also quite close to the Schuylkill River Trail, which goes all the way to the art museum and Fairmont park. The whole area is very walkable --- we don’t even own a car (there are zipcars and bikeshares very close by if you need them).

title: True Loft Expansive floor plan
description:
By appointment only.
TRUE Loft Living. Loft District Philadelphia in "The Hat Factory (circa 1899)"
1 bedroom/1bath: 1219 sq. ft. (plus extra upstairs loft space upstairs about 200 sq ft)
Green Space/Park Access: YES! The Rail Park entrance is directly across/adjacent to our building!
Ceiling Height: 13 ft
Exposed brick & wooden beams (all original and sanded/scrapped to perfection)
Walk Score: 95+ (Walker's Paradise)
Transit Score: 100 (Rider's Paradise)
In one of the most desirable areas in Philadelphia. A true custom built loft space with high ceilings and much more. The loft district is a premier choice when thinking about an investment as this area continues to increase in price.
PERFECT LOCATION: Easy access to I-95, Ben Franklin Bridge, and to all public transportation. Center City/ Philadelphia Convention Center and Reading Terminal only 5 blocks away. Cafe Lift in our building and
Yard's Brewery is around the corner on Spring Garden. Many more amazing restaurants, bars and venues...too many to list and all walking distance on block or a couple blocks away.
All closets, cabinets, stainless steel island and counters were made custom for this space.
Walk into this gorgeous and meticulously maintained open floor plan that offers exposed brick, heavy timber beams and original hardwood finished floors. Please note, the brick wall and large timber beams were painstakingly stripped from paint and sealed to their natural brick color/ natural wood color. 13' feet high ceilings make the space feel light and airy which adds to the unique character of this one of a kind space. Large windows (4) facing 13th Street allows natural light into the main living space.
The interior is custom designed and fabricated using premium materials, brands and thoughtful design.
All details are coordinated to maintain style, comfort, color scheme and smart/EZ living features.
